Class.name: COM.fwk.entity.Persistent
Class.Description:
Represents a persistent @nM entity.

In the architecture, this class must be the base class for all the objects in the persistent layer.

Deals with all knowledge a persistent class must own: convenience methods for executing specific queries, methods for generic queries, default callback methods for dealing with integration issues with @nM, and exception handling methods.

Author: Pablo Gandulfo - Disclinc Brasil Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil Author: Francisco Lima - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: listEntities
Method.Description:
This method takes the specified query and executes it. With the result set in hands, for each line returned, it uses the first field in the field list to load the persistent entity that derives from this class. So, returns a list of these entities.

If the query has parameters, they can be passed as parameters, to the maximum of 5 parameters.

Note that the first column of the query must be the Id of the persistent entity, otherwise the entities won't be loaded.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation:
set paramsList = ##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New()
do:$data(queryParam1) paramsList.Insert(queryParam1) do:$data(queryParam2) paramsList.Insert(queryParam2) do:$data(queryParam3) paramsList.Insert(queryParam3) do:$data(queryParam4) paramsList.Insert(queryParam4) do:$data(queryParam5) paramsList.Insert(queryParam5)
quit ..listEntitiesList(query, paramsList)

Method.name: listEntitiesList
Method.Description:
Loads a list of objects from the database.

Parameter: query - the SQL query for the entity. Note that the first column of the query must be the Id of the persistent entity.
Parameter: paramsList - a list of parameters that will be used on the query

Returns: a list of the database objects.

Author: Francisco Fiuza Lima - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: executeQuery
Method.Description:
Executes a query.

Parameter: query - the query to be executed.
Parameter: queryParams - the parameters to be used on the query.

returns: a Result Set for the executed query.

Author: Francisco Fiuza Lima - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation:
set paramsList = ##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New()
do:$data(queryParam1) paramsList.Insert(queryParam1) do:$data(queryParam2) paramsList.Insert(queryParam2) do:$data(queryParam3) paramsList.Insert(queryParam3) do:$data(queryParam4) paramsList.Insert(queryParam4) do:$data(queryParam5) paramsList.Insert(queryParam5)
quit ..executeQueryList(query, paramsList)

Method.name: executeQueryList
Method.Description:
Executes a query.

Parameter: query - the query to be executed.
Parameter: paramsList - a list of parameters to be used on the query.

returns: a Result Set for the executed query.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: prepareQuery
Method.Description:
Prepares a query for the given sql code.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation:
set rs = ##class(%ResultSet).%New()
do rs.Prepare(sql)
quit rs

Method.name: closeQuery
Method.Description:
Closes a resultSet.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation: do rs.Close()

Method.name: getObjectProperty
setObjectProperty
Method.Description:
This is a generic method to returns the property of any object, given the property name.

parameter: objectORef - the object reference.
parameter: propertyName - the name of the property.

returns the value os the property

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil This is a generic method to set the property of any object, given the property name.

parameter: objectORef - the object reference.
parameter: propertyName - the name of the property.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation: do $ZOBJMETHOD(objectORef, propertyName _ "Set", value)

Method.name: loadPersistentEntity
Method.Description:
This is a generic method to load an Entity from the database.

parameter: persistentEntityName - the name of the entity.
parameter: persistentEntityId - the id of the entity. This is the %Id property of an object that is the ID column of the table.

returns the entity.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation: quit $System.OBJ.OpenId(persistentEntityName, persistentEntityId)

Method.name: persistentIdToNManagerId
Method.Description:
Converts a persistent id to respective net manager id.

Conversion: companyCode||pk1||pk2||...||pkn turns to pk1,pk2,...,pkn.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation: set companyRemoved = $extract(persistentId, $find(persistentId, "||"), $length(persistentId)) quit ##class(COM.fwk.util.StringUtil).substituteString(companyRemoved, "||", ",")

Method.name: nManagerIdToPersistentId
Method.Description:
Converts a persistent id to respective net manager id.

Conversion: companyCode||pk1||pk2||...||pkn turns to pk1,pk2,...,pkn.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation:
set id = ##class(COM.fwk.util.StringUtil).substituteString(nManagerId, ",", "||")
set companyCode = ..getSession().getCurrentCompanyCode()
quit companyCode _ "||" _ id

Method.name: IdGet
Method.Description:
Returns the %Id of an Object. This method exists so the developer can access the Id property doing object.Id instead of doing object.%Id().
This is just a convenience method to give the option to the developer to use an accessor method for the %Id property.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation: quit ..%Id()

Method.name: nManagerIdGet
Method.Description:
Converts a persistent id to respective net manager id.

Conversion: companyCode||pk1||pk2||...||pkn turns to pk1,pk2,...,pkn.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation: quit ..persistentIdToNManagerId(..%Id())

Method.name: getSession
Method.Description:
returns a session object.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: getFormDefinition
Method.Description:
returns a @net Manager form register. This method is obsolete and will be replaced by one that returns a Form object.

Author: Pablo Gandulfo - Disclinc Brasil [Previously private]
Method.Implementation:
quit:(tableName = "") ("") quit:('$data(^WWW120(0, tableName, 1))) ("")
quit ^WWW120(0, tableName, 1)

Method.name: getClassFieldDefinition
Method.Description:
returns a @net Manager class field register. This method is obsolete and will be replaced by one that returns a Class Field object.

Author: Pablo Gandulfo - Disclinc Brasil [Previously private]
Method.Implementation:
quit:(tableName = "") ("") quit:(indexField = "") ("") quit:('$data(^WWW003(0, tableName, indexField, 1))) ("")
quit ^WWW003(0, tableName, indexField, 1)

Method.name: initialize
Method.Description:
This method initialize the %className, %tableName, %schemaName and %primaryKeyNames atributes.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil [Previously private]

Method.name: getSchemaName
Method.Description:
Returns the schemaName for a given className.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: getObjectById
Method.Description:
Returns an object given its Id.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation:
do ..initialize()
set resultObj = $System.OBJ.OpenId(%className, id) if '$isObject(resultObj) { set resultObj = $$$NULLOREF }
set %object = resultObj
quit resultObj

Method.name: findByPrimaryKey
Method.Description:
Returns a entity given its primary keys.
You may omit the company number on the key List.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: findByPrimaryKeyList
Method.Description:
Returns a entity given its primary keys in a list of objects.
You may omit the company number on the key List.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: getFirst
Method.Description:
Returns the first object from the database ordered by its %Id.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation:
do ..initialize()
set resultSet = ""
do ..prepareQuery(.resultSet, " SELECT Min(%Id) AS Id "_ " FROM " _ %schemaName _ "." _%tableName_" ") do resultSet.Execute()
set resultId = ""
if resultSet.Next() { set resultId = resultSet.Data("Id") } else { set resultId = "" }
do ..closeQuery(.resultSet)
quit ..getObjectById(resultId)

Method.name: getPrevious
Method.Description:
Returns the previous object from the database given an object based on their %Id.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: getNext
Method.Description:
Returns the next object from the database given an object based on their %Id.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: getLast
Method.Description:
Returns the last object from the database ordered by its %Id.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation:
do ..initialize()
set resultSet = ""
do ..prepareQuery(.resultSet, " SELECT Max(%Id) AS Id "_ " FROM " _ %schemaName _ "." _%tableName_" ")
do resultSet.Execute()
set resultId = ""
if resultSet.Next() { set resultId = resultSet.Data("Id") } else { set resultId = "" }
do ..closeQuery(.resultSet)
quit ..getObjectById(resultId)

Method.name: getPrimaryKeyValues
Method.Description:
Returns the primary key values of the object.
The key will be returned using comman as delimeter, i.e.: "key1,key2,key3" If the global format is set to true the ",1" will be added to the keys.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: getGlobalData
Method.Description:
returns the data as is stored in the globals.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation:
do ..initialize()
set data = ""
set execString = "set data = ^"_%tableName_"("_..getPrimaryKeyValues(1)_")"
xecute execString
quit data

Method.name: %OnBeforeSave
Method.Description:
Before saving any entity, this method checks if the keys has been defined. If not, it will get the next one based on its Numerator. It also fills in the object protocols date fields

Author: Pablo Gandulfo - Disclinc Brasil Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: %OnAfterSave
Method.Implementation: // TODO deveria chamar o WWWSPEI, ver com Frank o que fazer. quit $$$OK

Method.name: %OnDelete
Clone
getClassCompanyKey
raiseException
Method.Implementation: set %COMfwkException = exception set $ECODE = %COMfwkException

Method.name: raiseRuntimeException
Method.Implementation: do ..raiseException(##class(RuntimeException).%New(exceptionDescription, $get(%COMfwkException)))

Method.name: getNextKey
Method.Description:
Returns the next primary key for the Entity. If the Entity has 3 primary keys, the first two must be provided and so on.

Author: Francisco Fiuza Lima - Disclinc Brasil

Throws: COM.fwk.exception.BusinessException - If you provide more the 2 keys.
Method.Implementation: quit ##class(ClassBO).%New().getNextKey(..%ClassName(1), keyList)

Method.name: save
Method.Description:
Saves the persistent entity.

Must be called instead of %Save() Cach√® method, because it deals with exception treatment and with concurrent edition in the same entity.

If the param overwriteConcurrentEditions is true, goes through all editions being done over this entity (WWWDATEN) and overwrite the edition data with the new data saved. This practice should be avoided, because edition data will probably be lost.

Author: Frank Lima - Disclinc Brasil, Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: overwriteConcurrentEditions
Method.Description:
Goes through all editions being done over this entity and overwrite the edition data with the new data saved. Only overwrites the changed fields (the difference between the data base version and the saving version of the entity).

This practice should be avoided, because edition data will probably be lost.

Implementation details: as this method is called on a entity under saving, first creates a copy of the entity itself (that have the new values to be saved), then reload this entity's data from the database, so it is possible to know exactly what fields have changed.

It gets the list of changed fields and, for each field changed, gets its piece number and its new value, organizing them into lists.

Then gets all forms that uses the under saving entity and, for each form, updates all edition data that exists for the primary key of this entity.

Then, copy the original new values to the current entity. As this method is called by the save method, the entity will be normaly saved after this process.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: raiseStatusException
Method.Implementation:
set err = "" Do DecomposeStatus^%apiOBJ(status, .err, "-d") set message = "" for i=1:1:err { set message = message_err(i)_breakLineSymbol } ;WRITE "DECOMPOSE STATUS: "_message_"
" do ..raiseRuntimeException(message) ;WRITE "AFTER DECOMPOSE STATUS
" quit
